settings.title: 1st Step
settings.content: Add items to your cart. Available on orders $50+.

settings.title: What is the option to pay in installments on Shop Pay?
settings.answer:
When checking out with Shop Pay, you now have the option to pay now or later. Paying in installments on Shop Pay allows you to pay for your order in two ways: (1) 4 Biweekly Payments or (2) Monthly Payments*.

The first option allows you to split your purchase amount into 4 equal, biweekly installment payments.

The second option allows you to pay monthly installments that are interest-bearing, and may be paid in 3, 6, or 12 months depending on the purchase amount.

Your first payment is due at checkout. The remaining payments are automatically charged to your card saved on Shop Pay based on the payment plan you chose. Don't worry, you'll get an email reminder before each payment to remind you.

Payment installments are unavailable for recurring subscriptions at this time.

Note: We are excited to make the financing products of Shop Pay available to you to make your online shopping experience more joyful. However, as an unaffiliated entity, Shop Pay and its lenders make all decisions with regard to the particular financing product it will offer you without any input from us at Skyward Medical. As such, questions regarding the financing product offered (or not offered) to you are best directed to the great people at Shop Pay at https://shoppay.affirm.com/us/s/.

settings.title: Which payment methods are accepted if I use the option to pay in installments on Shop Pay?
settings.answer:
If you choose to split your total into 4 equal, interest-free payments, you may use debit and credit cards.

If you choose to make monthly payments, you may only use debit cards.

Please note: Capital One cards are not accepted.

Note: We are excited to make the financing products of Shop Pay available to you to make your online shopping experience more joyful. However, as an unaffiliated entity, Shop Pay and its lenders make all decisions with regard to the particular financing product it will offer you without any input from us at Skyward Medical. As such, questions regarding the financing product offered (or not offered) to you are best directed to the great people at Shop Pay at https://shoppay.affirm.com/us/s/.

settings.title: Are there late fees?
settings.answer:
No, there are no late fees if you miss a scheduled payment.

Note: We are excited to make the financing products of Shop Pay available to you to make your online shopping experience more joyful. However, as an unaffiliated entity, Shop Pay and its lenders make all decisions with regard to the particular financing product it will offer you without any input from us at Skyward Medical. As such, questions regarding the financing product offered (or not offered) to you are best directed to the great people at Shop Pay at https://shoppay.affirm.com/us/s/.
